mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment p JOIN orders o ON p.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN users u ON o.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN order_history oh ON o.ORDER_ID = oh.ORDER_ID JOIN common_code cc ON p.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE = cc.CODE
mapper.insert: insert into payment( ORDER_ID, PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE, PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE) values( #{orderId}, #{paymentMethodCode}, #{paymentTypeCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT "paymentId", "orderId", "paymentDate", "uname", "type", oh.PRICE AS "price", oh.PRICE - (oh.PRICE * 0.10) AS "netProfit" FROM ( SELECT p.PAYMENT_ID AS "paymentId", o.ORDER_ID AS "orderId", TO_CHAR(p.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "paymentDate", u.UNAME AS "uname", cc.TYPE AS "type" FROM payment p JOIN orders o ON p.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID JOIN users u ON o.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN common_code cc ON p.PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE = cc.CODE WHERE 1=1 AND p.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate) AND TRUNC(sysdate) + (1 - 1/24/60/60) ) m INNER JOIN order_history oh ON oh.ORDER_ID = m."orderId" ORDER BY "paymentDate" DESC, "paymentId" DESC
